import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-avatar', templateUrl: './avatar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./avatar.component.css'] }) export class AvatarComponent { userData:any constructor(){ } ngInit(){ this.userData= JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')||""); } }
